PILE: PILE shuffle: place cards into piles sequentially, looping back to the fist when needed. Pick up sequentially.
RANDOM_PILE: RANDOM_PILE shuffle: place cards into piles, one by one, each into a random pile. Pick up sequentially.
LOCATION_DELTA: LOCATION_DELTA scoring: measure the average distance each card traveled from where it began.
